Package com.example.mareu.ui

Class MeetingSharedViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.mareu.ui.MeetingSharedViewModel
public class MeetingSharedViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel shared between fragments to manage meeting-related data. This ViewModel serves as a shared data holder for meeting-related information across multiple fragments. It provides LiveData for observing meeting lists and methods to interact with the underlying data.

    • isSameDay

    • applyFiltersAndUpdateList

      public void applyFiltersAndUpdateList()
      Applies the current filters to the list of meetings and updates the LiveData. If no filters are set, the method retrieves the unfiltered list of meetings from the repository. If the room filter is set, it filters meetings by room. If the date filter is set, it filters meetings by date.

    • resetFilters

      public void resetFilters()
      Resets filters to their default values and updates the meeting list.
